translations.translation: For more detailed information, please read our guides.
Sign up to the OVH Summit in Paris, which will be held on 18th October 2018 (link opens in a new tab). You can meet OVH experts, our partners, and Europe's most innovative startups.

A maintenance operation is scheduled for the BHS1 region on the 19th of September 2018, between 3:00 and 8:00 UTC-4. No disturbance is to be expected on your instances, only some APIs in this region will be unreachable for the duration of the operation
More detail on Service Status task:
